title: STAND BOLDLY & SHINE BRIGHTLY! A KID'S GUIDE TO FACING BULLIES
description: There are people in the world who make us feel good about ourselves... but then there are also people who go out of their way to make another person feel hurt, afraid or uncomfortable. These are the BULLIES of the world! Have you ever had someone bully you? What did you do? Have you ever bullied yourself? Learn what's really important underneath it all about yourself and other people...and start to STAND BOLDLY and SHINE BRIGHTLY!
author: Tracy Bryan
